name: Beef Vegetable Kebabs
description: Colorful grilled kebabs with marinated beef and seasonal vegetables. Perfect for barbecues and outdoor cooking.

instructions.instruction: Prepare marinade: Mix olive oil, lemon juice, garlic, oregano, cumin, salt, and pepper.
Place beef cubes in a bowl. Pour half the marinade over and mix well.
Marinate for at least 30 minutes, or up to 4 hours in the refrigerator.
Cut vegetables into similar-sized pieces as the beef.
Thread beef and vegetables alternately onto skewers.
instructions.tip: Soak wooden skewers in water for 30 minutes to prevent burning.

instructions.instruction: Grill kebabs for 10-15 minutes, turning every 3-4 minutes.
instructions.tip: For medium-rare, internal temperature should be 57°C (135°F).

instructions.instruction: Let rest for 5 minutes before serving.

tips: Kebabs are great for outdoor gatherings.
Use metal skewers for easier handling.
Can be cooked on a grill pan indoors.
storageInfo: Best served fresh. Leftovers can be refrigerated for 2 days.
servingSuggestion: Serve with tzatziki sauce, rice pilaf, or flatbread.
variations: Chicken or lamb can be used instead.
Add mushrooms and eggplant for variety.
